oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William A. Cook and Louvenia Slate Cook photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Cpl. William A. Cook, Co. D, 8th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA, and his wife, Louvenia Slate Cook. William A. Cook was born on March 18, 1848, in Smith County, Tennessee. He was the son of William and Amandy Cook. Cook died on January 23, 1921 in Macon County, Tennessee, and is buried in Whitley Cemetery at Red Boiling Springs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cook, William A.; Cook, Louvenia Slate
